app.name: FridgeWiseAI
app.tagline: Turn your ingredients into amazing recipes with AI

validation.newPasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 6 characters
validation.suspiciousActivity: Suspicious activity detected. Please try again.
validation.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please wait before trying again.
validation.formTooFast: Form submitted too quickly. Please take your time.
validation.formExpired: Form session expired. Please refresh and try again.
validation.insufficientInteraction: Please interact with the form properly.
validation.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions

hero.title: Smart Recipes from Your
hero.subtitle: Take a photo of your fridge and get personalized AI recipes instantly. Transform leftovers into extraordinary dishes.

features.title: Amazing Features
features.subtitle: Discover how FridgeWise AI revolutionizes the way you cook

recognize.title: Smart Recognition
recognize.description: Advanced AI recognizes ingredients from photos with 95% accuracy

recipes.title: Personalized Recipes
recipes.description: Get recipes tailored to your ingredients, diet, and culinary preferences

save.title: Save Favorites
save.description: Build your personal collection of favorite recipes and access them anywhere

zeroWaste.title: Zero Waste
zeroWaste.description: Reduce food waste by using everything you have in your fridge

multilang.title: Multi-language
multilang.description: Available in Italian, English, French, and German

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.description: Access your saved recipes even without internet connection

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to transform your ingredients into delicious dishes

step1.title: Take a Photo
step1.description: Photograph the ingredients you have available

step2.title: AI Analyzes
step2.description: Our AI automatically recognizes and categorizes ingredients

step3.title: Get Recipes
step3.description: Receive personalized recipes and start cooking

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Kitchen?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who have already discovered the magic of AI in cooking

support.title: Support FridgeWise AI
support.description: If you love our app, consider supporting us to keep it free and help us continue improving it for everyone.

footer.description: FridgeWise AI helps you cook intelligently, reducing waste and discovering new recipes with ingredients you already have.

camera.title: Scan Ingredients
camera.permissionDeniedDescription: We need camera access to scan your ingredients
camera.permissionInstructions: We need camera access to scan your ingredients
camera.deviceNotFound: No camera device found on this device
camera.deviceNotFoundGallery: No camera found. You can upload from your gallery instead.
camera.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support camera access
camera.iOSPermissionError: On iOS, you need to grant camera permission in Settings
camera.iOSGuidance: Try using Safari on iOS for better camera support
camera.safariAskDescription: Safari requires your permission for the camera. Tap the button below and then allow access when prompted.
camera.notAnImage: Selected file is not an image
camera.iOSInstructions4: Go to Settings > Privacy & Security > Camera
camera.iOSInstructions6: Return to Safari and reload the page
camera.alternativeSolutionDescription: You can still take photos using the "Take Photo with iPhone Camera" button below. This will directly open your iPhone's camera to take a photo.
camera.serviceUnavailable: Recognition service unavailable. Please try again later.
camera.noIngredientsDetected: No ingredients detected in the image. Try with a clearer photo.
camera.noNewIngredientsDetected: No new ingredients detected. Try with another photo.
camera.choiceTitle: How would you like to add ingredients?
camera.choiceSubtitle: Choose the method you prefer to select your ingredients
camera.searchPromptSubtitle: Type at least 2 characters to start searching

recipes.title: Your Recipes
recipes.subtitle: Delicious recipes based on your ingredients

empty.title: No recipes yet
empty.subtitle: Start by scanning some ingredients to generate your first recipe!

cookingMode.stepCompleted: Step completed! Ready for the next one?

cookingMode.allIngredientsReady: All ingredients checked! Ready to start cooking?

home.subtitle: Ready to discover new recipes from your ingredients?
home.noRecipesSubtitle: Start by scanning your ingredients to generate your first recipe
home.proTipContent: For best results, take clear photos of your ingredients with good lighting. The AI works better when it can see individual items clearly.
home.supportDescription: Help us keep improving the app!

savedRecipes.subtitle: Your favorite recipes collection
savedRecipes.saveToSee: Save your favorite recipes to see them here
